question: The diagonal of a square A is (a+b). The diagonal of a square whose are is twice the area of square A, is

Area of the new square 
$latex = \\frac{\\left ( a+b \\right )^{2}}{2}\\times 2 = \\left ( a+b \\right )^{2}&s=1$
